meaningMnemonic: The card game fish are best at is <radical>blackjack</radical> because they can easily hold the cards with their <radical>fins</radical> <kanji>together</kanji>. In blackjack you don't have to have a huge hand, full of cards. It's just a few, so fish fins can keep them together and just hit or stay.
readingMnemonic: Once a year trillions of fish get <kanji>together</kanji> in <reading>きょう</reading>と to play blackjack. They have a huge tournament there once a year.
